name: Rogue Zillion
summary:
The Zillion space mercenary team encounters a gigantic abandoned alien space ship, and must destroy the entire threat. This game has Rogue Lite and Permadeath properties and is spiritual successor to great games of the past: Section Z, Final Mission / S.C.A.T. , Chelnov Atomic Runner, Forgotten Worlds, Burai Fighter. 
This is an NEStalgica adventure !!!
